articles.title: Italian Ikea opens up its doors for stray dogs
articles.description: Social media users around the world are praising an Ikea in Catania, Italy after it was revealed that the store is letting in stray dogs during the cold winter months.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Why you should find out if your doctor is being paid by medical device companies
articles.description: A 2017 study found that roughly half of U.S. doctors receive payments from pharmaceutical and medical device companies. NBC’s Stephanie Gosk looks into how those payments might affect patient care.

articles.title: If Black Friday felt quieter, it’s because shoppers were online

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Mall shooting amid Black Friday chaos
articles.description: When a fight broke out between two young men at an Alabama mall, one pulled a gun, injuring the other and a 12-year-old girl nearby. The shooter was shot dead by police.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Who helped U.S. missionary embark on deadly mission?
articles.description: Indian police want to find out who helped 26-year-old John Chau on an illegal mission to reach the remote Sentinel Island, where he was killed by an indigenous tribe with a bow and arrow.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: James Comey will testify - if it’s public

articles.title: Roger Stone associate Jerome Corsi says he is negotiating plea agreement with Mueller
